transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hi, good afternoon sir.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello, hello.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, Dipesh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji sir, thoda gaadi chala raha tha main.
Executive: Achcha, kitni der mein free honge?
Customer: Main 20 kilometer jaana hai mujhe.
Executive: Theek hai, main aadhe ghante mein karta hu, theek hai sir?
Customer: Haan, batao.
Executive: Urgent kuch nahi, kuch document vagaira mere ko aapko matlab chahiye the KYC regarding, kuch KYC aapki
Customer: Aapki KYC pending hai, uske kuch document chahiye the.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha, aadhe ghante mein bata raha hu mujhe kya kya chahiye main bhejta hu aapko.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.
Customer: Main to aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive needs KYC documents from customer.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back in half an hour.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back in half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- kyc, documents, follow up
